data.eml:eml: Isometopus anlasi sp. nov. (Heteroptera: Miridae) from Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Çerçi, Bariş, Dursun, Ahmet (2017): Isometopus anlasi sp. nov. (Heteroptera: Miridae) from Turkey. Zootaxa 4353 (2), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4353.2.9
